channel.title: BUbreakingSectionTwo
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingSectionTwo, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Emboldened Kremlin Steps Up Efforts to Seize Businesses in Russia
item.description: The legal onslaught on Moscow’s second-largest airport has been seen as part of the Kremlin’s wartime drive to seize control of key assets still in pr...

item.title: India’s Outrage Machine Devours a Star YouTuber Over a Crude One-Liner
item.description: A joke made by Ranveer Allahbadia, a Joe Rogan for online Indians, has brought him death threats and criminal charges.

item.title: Palantir CEO Alex Karp made nearly $2 billion from selling company stock last year—mostly in the leadup to the presidential election
item.description: The controversial defense contractor saw a sixfold surge in the value of its stock last year.

item.title: Target backtracking its DEI efforts backfired. Store traffic dropped nearly 10% after the company’s move to conclude its diversity-related goals and initiatives
item.description: It was the first drop in foot traffic this year for Target.

item.title: Pete Hegseth Fires Adm. Lisa Franchetti, Navy’s Top Officer
item.description: Adm. Lisa Franchetti spent roughly half of her 40-year career at sea, commanding a destroyer, two carrier strike groups and the U.S. Sixth Fleet.

item.title: India’s Outrage Machine Devours a Star YouTuber Over a Crude One-Liner
item.description: A joke made by Ranveer Allahbadia, a Joe Rogan for online Indians, has brought him death threats and criminal charges.

item.title: Voletta Wallace, the Notorious B.I.G.’s Mother, Dies at 78
item.description: She played the rapper music as a child, stood by his side during his meteoric career and navigated the legal and artistic questions that arose after h...

item.title: Israel Confirms Body Returned by Hamas Is Shiri Bibas
item.description: DNA testing had found that remains returned a day earlier purportedly of Ms. Bibas, a dead Israeli hostage, were in fact not hers, stirring outrage in...

item.title: Lawyer for Sean ‘Diddy’ Combs says ‘under no circumstances can I continue’ as defense counsel
item.description: Combs, 55, has pleaded not guilty to sex trafficking charges lodged against him after his September arrest.

item.title: As the U.S. Exits Foreign Aid, Who Will Fill the Gap?
item.description: China could reap the soft-power advantage, but like Western governments, the country is cutting back on aid. Philanthropies say they cannot replace th...

item.title: The dangers of drinking: Experts explain the 4 ways alcohol can cause cancer
item.description: You don’t have to partake in binge drinking or have alcohol use disorder to increase your risk of alcohol-associated cancer.

item.title: Trump threatens to withhold federal funding from Maine after governor vows state will ‘follow the law’ on transgender athletes
item.description: An executive order Trump signed gives federal agencies wide latitude to make sure entities that receive federal funding abide by the Trump administrat...

item.title: Ukraine Promises Swift Deal for Minerals as Trump Cuts Kyiv Out of Peace Talks
item.description: President Trump on Friday continued to bash President Volodymyr Zelensky of Ukraine and pressure him for mineral rights.
